nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner
Claimable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier throws if called by any account other than the pendingOwner.
nodes.name: onlyPendingOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.
nodes.name: claimOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

nodes.documentation:
@title Administratable
@dev The Admin contract has the list of admin addresses.
nodes.name: Administratable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account that's not admin or owner.
nodes.name: onlyAdmin
addAddressToAdmin
removeAddressFromAdmin
Callable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier throws if called by any account other than the callers or owner.
nodes.name: onlyCaller
addAddressToCaller
removeAddressFromCaller

nodes.documentation:
@title Blacklist
@dev The Blacklist contract has a blacklist of addresses, and provides basic authorization control functions.
nodes.name: Blacklist

nodes.documentation:
@title Verified
@dev The Verified contract has a list of verified addresses.
nodes.name: Verified

nodes.documentation:
@title Allowance
@dev Storage for the Allowance List.
nodes.name: Allowance

nodes.documentation:
@title Balance
@dev Storage for the Balance List.
nodes.name: Balance

nodes.documentation:
@title UserContract
@dev A contract for the blacklist and verified list modifiers.
nodes.name: UserContract

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if the given address is blacklisted.
nodes.name: onlyNotBlacklistedAddr

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if one of the given addresses is blacklisted.
nodes.name: onlyNotBlacklistedAddrs

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if the given address is not verified.
nodes.name: onlyVerifiedAddr

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if one of the given addresses is not verified.
nodes.name: onlyVerifiedAddrs

nodes.documentation:
@title ControllerContract
@dev A contract for managing the blacklist and verified list and burning and minting of the tokens.
nodes.name: ControllerContract
addAddressToBlacklist
addAddressesToBlacklist
removeAddressFromBlacklist
removeAddressesFromBlacklist
verifyAddress
verifyAddresses
unverifyAddress
unverifyAddresses

nodes.documentation:
@dev set if to use the verified list
@param value true if should verify address, false if should skip address verification
nodes.name: shouldVerify
burnFrom
limitBurnFrom
limitMint
mint
allowance

nodes.documentation: @dev Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
nodes.name: _transfer
transfer
batchTransfer

approve

burn
